pr_title: FINERACT-821 Added and enforced ParameterName checkstyle

timeline.message: FINERACT-821 Added and enforced ParameterName checkstyle

timeline.bodyText: @thesmallstar I was surprised that the RegExp change was required.. * is zero or many (+ is "at least one"), are you 100% sure that this is required? I'm just going to merge this anyway as-is, but perhaps you'd like to retry after if this can't be changed back?
timeline.author: vorburger
